metadata.title: CVE-2021-33655 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When sending malicous data to kernel by ioctl cmdFBIOPUT_VSCREENINFO,kernel will write memory out of bounds.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
